name: txtconf
short_description:
txtconf is designed to be complementation for getopt(3), using very similar ways for defining configuration file structure.
The idea is to implement universal, easy and efficient way to read and save configuration from/to human-readable text files.
Options are organized in scopes, can have defined default values, and their appearance in file may be set as optional or mandatory. Scopes and options can be referenced by name or by custom IDs. All delimiters are configurable. Semi-automatic Validator allows to check option's values against type-corectness.

Man-page included.
Tests included.
summary: Library for handlig text configuration files
